entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING ENDED, Williams Lake

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm except 10 cm near the Cariboo mountains. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 5:14 PM PST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Cloudy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries near the Cariboo mountains. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 5:14 PM PST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:14 PM PST Wednesday 01 February 2023
